questions: Does your business need to access sales information and/or reporting for multiple locations on one system?

questions.answer: my business needs to access sales information and/or reporting to multiple locations on one system.
my business does not need to access sales information and/or reporting to multiple locations on one system.

my restaurant does not need pay-at-the-table or other mobile payment optons.
